p: The date of the end of the SEI for the rural average was the first half of July at the beginning of the 40-year period, and the end of July/the beginning of August at its end. The trends of the SEI ending later over the years were more pronounced than the trends of SEI commencing earlier. For the rural average, k = 7 days/10 years, R 2 = 0.26, p < 0.01.
